data.description: Provides the Basic Header Block 1 for SWIFT
data.PS: The following links are only valid for module list maintainers:
data.rationale:
This module is used by the SWIFT::Factory::MT300 and is intended to
    be used by any other SWIFT::Factory::MTnnn module produced later on,
    by any author.

    It could also be used stand-alone, but that is less probable to be
    the case.
